results.description: Olivier Ntcham's stoppage-time strike earns Celtic a stunning win over Lazio in Rome and a place in the knockout stages of the Europa League with two games to spare.
results.shortTitle: Celtic beat Lazio to reach last 32
results.title: Lazio 1-2 Celtic: Neil Lennon's side reach Europa League last 32

results.description: The two men were attacked outside a bar ahead of Celtic's Europa League match against Lazio.
results.title: Celtic fans stabbed by masked men in Rome

results.description: Celtic manager Neil Lennon hopes for a repeat of the "fantastic" atmosphere experienced at Celtic Park as the Scottish champions face Lazio in a Europa League return fixture.
results.shortTitle: 'We just want the fans to have a celebration'
results.title: Lazio v Celtic: 'We just want the fans to have a celebration' - Neil Lennon

results.description: Get in the mood for Celtic's next Europa League tie against Lazio by testing your knowledge on their previous encounters and connections with Italian football.

results.description: The 35-year-old was also given a two-year banning order following Thursday's Europa League clash.
results.title: Lazio fan fined over brawl with Celtic supporters

results.description: Lazio fans have been pictured making fascist salutes before and during their side's Europa League defeat by Celtic.

results.title: Celtic 2-1 Lazio: Italian fans pictured making fascist salutes

results.description: Christopher Jullien glances in a towering header two minutes from time as Celtic came from behind to earn a comeback Europa League win against Lazio.
results.title: Celtic 2-1 Lazio: Christopher Jullien header seals priceless win

results.description: Manager Neil Lennon says it is important his Celtic team "enhance our reputation in Europe" as they prepare to face Lazio in the Europa League.
results.title: Europa League: Celtic manager Neil Lennon relishing Lazio tie

results.description: Uefa orders a partial closure of Lazio's stadium for the Italian club's next European home game following the racist behaviour of their fans.
results.title: Racism in football: Uefa punish Lazio with partial stadium closure for fan behaviour

results.description: Lazio avoid full stadium closure for the visit of Celtic in the Europa League following racist behaviour from fans.

results.description: Luiz Alberto scores a second-half equaliser as Lazio secured a point in a pulsating Rome derby with Roma.

results.description: Aberdeen have had no contact from Lazio regarding Sam Cosgrove, despite a report in Italy suggesting the Serie A club are interested in the striker.

results.description: Atalanta manager Gian Piero Gasperini says the lack of a VAR decision in the Coppa Italia final was "a scandal."

results.title: Atalanta 0-2 Lazio: Atalanta manager says Coppa Italia decision was "a scandal"

results.description: Lazio accuse the media of a "simplistic tendency" to blame all of the club's fans for instances of racism and fascism following incidents in the 1-0 Coppa Italia win at AC Milan.

results.description: Swapping football shirts at the end of a game is usually a sign of respect. Not so much in Milan's game against Lazio.
